outline:
1. to look at or to, regard, gaze at or about
    1. (Qal) to gaze at, regard, behold, look about
    2. (Hiphil) to look away, cause gaze to turn away
    3. (Hithpael) to look in dismay, gaze about (in anxiety)
kjv_def: depart, be dim, be dismayed, look (away), regard, have respect, spare, turn.
strongs_def: to gaze at or about (properly, for help); by implication, to inspect, consider, compassionate, be nonplussed (as looking around in amazement) or bewildered
